content: stitches and techniques i-cord with gray create six i-cord spikes each four row high before bobble bring the bobble end down towards the starting end but do not weave in or trim yet sew the spikes to the pauldrons each pauldron has a set of three spikes to be sewn onto row 3 of the pauldrons one at each end and one in the center of the row it s easier to manage the ends of the spikes by sewing them individually onto the pauldron take both tails of a spike piece and bring them through the top of the pauldron with the yarn needle before securing the spike gently pull the bobble end of the spike to create an upward curve reposition the spike as needed finish sewing the spike onto the pauldron bring the yarn ends back under the pauldron tie off and weave-in the ends trimming off any excess repeat for the remaining spikes gorget neck guard with gray chain 25 row 1 blosc in second chain from hook 23 blosc = 24 blosc row 2 3 24 blosc = 24 blosc bobble leave a long tail for sewing sew the pauldrons to the gorget starting from each end of the gorget line up the edges of the pauldrons along the gorget s starting chain sew the three pieces together weave-in the ends back plate hold the gorget with the pauldrons spikes facing you with gray slip_stitch join to the first single_crochet of the gap of the gorget between the pauldrons row 1 chain 1 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet single_crochet increase turn = 6 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 6 single_crochet turn = 6 single_crochet row 3 blo slip_stitch 4 blosc blo slip_stitch turn = 4 blosc row 4 slip_stitch into second blosc single_crochet in same st 3 single_crochet = 4 single_crochet bobble the completed gorget and spiked pauldrons will wrap around the neck later the armor will need to be reshaped after sewing darksol diminutive devil king 8 sew the cape front to the chest plate rotate the cape front piece so the beginning chain is on top and curve the piece upwards sew the tail of the beginning chain around the last stitch of row 6 of the chest plate take the other tail and sew the tenth stitch of row 1 of the cape front to the first stitch of row 6 of the chest plate attach the chest plate to the body position the chest plate so that the ends of row 6 are centered over the top of the body the top of the chest plate should overlap the lower portion of darksol s face sew the chest plate s end tail into the nearest stitch gap on the body take a length of gray yarn to sew the other side of the chest plate to the body secure row 1 of the chest plate to the body as well tie
